name: LudumDare 48 - Dig World
description:
Dig the ground, find treasures, and gain wealth. Dig deeper for more valuable chests. Be the richest person on the server to win.

Built with:

- Rust with my own "engine"

- iPad with Pencil

- My genius mind

- Audacity, microphone and guitar

Source code: https://github.com/kuviman/ludumdare48/
